```lisp
[
  (:action scrub ; Scrub an item to clean it
    :parameters (?item - object)
    :precondition (and (is_dirty ?item) (not (is_clean ?item)))
    :effect (and (is_clean ?item) (not (is_dirty ?item)))
  ),
  (:action place ; Place an item in a specified location or setup
    :parameters (?u - user ?item - object ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and (available ?u) (valid_location ?loc) (can_place ?item ?loc))
    :effect (and (placed ?item ?loc) (not (available ?u)))
  ),
  (:action replace ; Replace an entity with a new one
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?entity - object)
    :precondition (and (requires_replacement ?entity) (not (replaced ?entity)))
    :effect (and (replaced ?entity) (updated ?entity))
  ),
  (:action finish ; Finish a task associated with an entity
    :parameters (?entity - object ?task - task)
    :precondition (and (task_completed ?entity ?task))
    :effect (is_finished ?task)
  )
]
```
